data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares Saatvik Green Energy Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from September 26 2025 the equity shares of Saatvik Green Energy Ltd (Scrip Code: 544526) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250925- dated September 25 2025.
